item.title: Overlooked Clue Sheds Light on Shakespeare’s Marriage
item.description: New research undermines the traditional view that Shakespeare was a distant, neglectful husband to his wife, Anne.

item.title: Student Stabs 4 Others, One Fatally, at a French High School
item.description: The motive was unclear for the attack, which occurred at a time of heightened concern in France about knife attacks in schools.
